title_REQ: No URLs expected in this page
_guidance: The 'body' field can contain one or more of ANY of the following field types

body.html: This section of the report presents information on the number of quit attempts and self-reported quit rates by a range of demographic variables.

body.title: Gender
body.html: A higher number of females attempted to quit in 2020/21 (103,027) than males (75,788).
